title: Instructional Design Practice Competency Enhancement: Online Continuous Professional Development (CPD) for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Identify and apply at least 3 new treatment protocols and evidence-based practices in medical settings
Establish and execute self-directed CPD plans at least once monthly using online learning platforms
Complete a knowledge-sharing project with peer experts using collaboration tools in digital environments once
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
